text:
- I was a veterinary
technician for 11 years.
I enrolled with AWS Cloud Institute

because I really felt like I
wanted to try something new

and I wanted to learn new skills
that are completely outside

I also wanted to open
up a new career path.
The instructors are super helpful and,
We have a community of learners.

We actually interact
quite a bit through Slack.

It's a very great and
supportive atmosphere.
I'm learning so many new things
and I am also just very grateful

for the opportunities
that I've been given.
I feel like I have a new path ahead
and that I can kind of choose right now,
